announcement.description: Time between deprecation announcement and sunset

migration.description: Time allowed for migration after announcement

warning.description: Days before sunset to send warning notifications

final.description: Days before sunset to send final notifications

FULL.description: Full feature support with bug fixes and enhancements

MAINTENANCE.description: Maintenance mode with bug fixes and security updates only

SECURITY_ONLY.description: Security updates only, no bug fixes or enhancements

NONE.description: No support provided, feature is sunset

ANNOUNCEMENT.subject: Deprecation Notice: {feature}
ANNOUNCEMENT.template: Feature '{feature}' has been deprecated and will be sunset on {sunsetDate}. Migration deadline: {migrationDeadline}. Please review the migration guide: {migrationGuide}

WARNING.subject: Deprecation Warning: {feature} - 30 Days Remaining
WARNING.template: Warning: Feature '{feature}' will be sunset in 30 days ({sunsetDate}). Migration deadline approaching: {migrationDeadline}. Immediate action required.

FINAL.subject: Final Notice: {feature} - 7 Days Remaining
FINAL.template: Final notice: Feature '{feature}' will be sunset in 7 days ({sunsetDate}). This is your last chance to migrate before service interruption.

SUNSET.subject: Service Sunset: {feature}
SUNSET.template: Feature '{feature}' has been sunset as of {timestamp}. Service is no longer available. Please contact support if you need assistance.

DATA_TRANSFORM.description: Transform data from old format to new format
